8~MOlbO{b@#Bil0Y.Zg5.text: How do you get this sprite to move 10 steps down or up when the down or up key is pressed?The answer is simple... Just do "Change Y by 5" for up and "Change Y by -5" for down.Do the same with "Change X by..."
